title: Beach Bonfire Incident
intro: During a summer bonfire party at Sunset Beach, someone collapses after drinking from a cooler. With waves crashing nearby and everyone in high spirits, secrets soon surface...
clues: One drink was tampered with — only the victim drank from that cup.
The lifeguard was seen sneaking near the cooler earlier in the evening.
A surfboard near the bonfire has suspicious stains.
A partially hidden note says: 'He’ll regret this,' in the victim's handwriting.
The rival friend had a stash of unused drinks matching the poisoned one.
